subject: GF6618766894708
description_text:
﻿That is tracking number.  They say it’s undeliverable could you change it to deliver it to the billing address. Both address are valid but maybe easier for them to deliver to my house.  
8639 west meadow dr 
Peoria Arizona 85382


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Jeff Gibson, due to time zone differences and language barriers, we can only send emails to the logistics provider. Please call GOFO Express to discuss this matter directly, as it will be much faster.     https://t.17track.net/en#nums=GF6618766894708
